DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_PERFORMANCE_SUSP
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT '1' ORDEM,'ENTRADA' SUBFASE, COUNT(HANDLE) ENTRADA
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS
WHERE MONTH(DATAINCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(DATAINCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
UNION
SELECT '2' ORDEM,'ENTRADA EXACT' SUBFASE,COUNT(DISTINCT A.HANDLE )
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO B ON B.PESSOA = A.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_TAREFAS C ON B.TAREFA = C.HANDLE
WHERE ((MONTH(B.DATAULTIMAALTERACAO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATAULTIMAALTERACAO) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND B.STATUS = 3)
OR (MONTH(B.DATACONCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATACONCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND B.STATUS = 2))
AND B.TAREFA IN (21,2)
AND A.SUBFASE = 31
UNION
SELECT '3' ORDEM,'FILTRO 1' SUBFASE,COUNT(B.HANDLE) TESTE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS B
WHERE MONTH(B.DATAFILTRO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATAFILTRO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND B.EXACTFASE = 2 AND B.EXACTULTIMOFILTRO = 2
UNION
SELECT '4' ORDEM,'FILTRO 2' SUBFASE,COUNT(B.HANDLE) TESTE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS B
WHERE MONTH(B.DATAFILTRO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATAFILTRO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND B.EXACTFASE = 3 AND B.EXACTULTIMOFILTRO = 3
UNION
SELECT '5' ORDEM,'PROSPECÇÃO',COUNT(A.HANDLE)
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
JOIN K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO B ON B.PESSOA = A.HANDLE
JOIN K_CRM_TAREFAS C ON B.TAREFA = C.HANDLE
WHERE MONTH(B.DATACONCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATACONCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND C.HANDLE = 8
UNION
SELECT '6' ORDEM,'QUALIFICADO' SUBFASE,COUNT(B.HANDLE) TESTE
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS B
WHERE MONTH(B.DATAFILTRO) = MONTH(GETDATE())
AND YEAR(B.DATAFILTRO) = YEAR(GETDATE())
AND B.EXACTFASE = 6
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="ORDEM" From="A" Path="ORDEM" /> <Field Alias="SUBFASE" From="A" Path="SUBFASE" /> <Field Alias="ENTRADA" From="A" Path="ENTRADA" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
